entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
